fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
head_office_address: Square du Val de la Cambre 16
eu_initiatives: Neighbourhood policy, Eastern Partnership, EU for Innovation, grant schemes available for Armenia
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Development of social and economic initiatives with the purpose to foster development of emerging countries, with a first implementation in Armenia. Themes considered: economic development (ideation and implementation of investments projects), social development (creation of jobs, development of educational infrastructures...), humanitarian topics (reflection on migration and integration issues).
